pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface for Large Language Model APIs in R // A unified interface to interact with various Large Language Model (LLM) APIs such as 'OpenAI' (see https://platform.openai.com/docs/quickstart for details), 'Anthropic' (see https://docs.anthropic.com/en/api/getting- started for details), 'Groq' (see https://console.groq.com/docs/api-reference for details), 'Together AI' (see https://docs.together.ai/docs/quickstart for details), 'DeepSeek' (see https://api-docs.deepseek.com for details), and 'Voyage AI' (see https://docs.voyageai.com/docs/introduction for details). Allows users to configure API parameters, send messages, and retrieve responses seamlessly within R.
